context.name: Detroid, Conant Gardens
context.description: This map shows the Conant Gardens and Northeast Central District neighborhoods in Detroit, Michigan. The area features a unique street layout with grid-like streets and diagonal routes like Conant Street.
context.north_beyond_map: Hamtramck—a multicultural city with Polish and Yemeni roots, known for its diverse shops and eateries.
context.south_beyond_map: Eastern Market—Detroit’s lively hub for fresh produce, local goods, and street art.
context.west_beyond_map: Grosse Pointe—affluent suburbs with lakeside views and upscale amenities.
context.east_beyond_map: Highland Park—an historic city with automotive roots, undergoing revitalization.
